original_title: Victor Borge: 100 Years of Music & Laughter!
overview: This unparalleled collection of Victor Borges funniest and most memorable skits contains such classic comedy bits as the timeless Phonetic Punctuation, Inflationary Language, Autumn Leaves with Robert Merrill, The Opera Singer with Marylyn Mulvey and more. Rare archival footage from the Borge family vault enhances this memorable retrospective. Rita Rudner narrates.
title: Victor Borge: 100 Years of Music & Laughter!
